languages.text: "Без сомнения. Даже самые искусные ведьмы и могучие кабалиты не сравнятся в разрушительности с нашим гением. Но я давно превзошел уровень, на котором творят банальных монстров для битв. Я делаю уникальных чудовищ! Мой предыдущий образец, Хтонос, превзошел все поделки моих соперников! Я кормил его отборными воителями, пока он не сбежал и не спрятался в Увечном секторе... Я бы изловил его, но новая идея увлекла меня!"

"Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"
languages.original_text: "Без сомнения. Даже самые искусные ведьмы и могучие кабалиты не сравнятся в разрушительности с нашим гением. Но я давно превзошел уровень, на котором творят банальных монстров для битв. Я делаю уникальных чудовищ! Мой предыдущий образец, Хтонос, превзошел все поделки моих соперников! Я кормил его отборными воителями, пока он не сбежал и не спрятался в Увечном секторе... Я бы изловил его, но новая идея увлекла меня!"

traits.locale_text: "Without question. Even the most skilful Wyches and the mightiest Kabalites cannot compare to the destructiveness of our genius. However, I rose above the level of building trite battle beasts long ago. I craft unique monstrosities! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I gave it choice warriors to feed on, but then it escaped and hid somewhere in the Mangled Sector... I could catch it, but a new idea has since captivated my mind!"

"Without question. Even the most skilful Wyches and the mightiest Kabalites cannot compare to the destructiveness of our genius. However, I rose above the level of building trite battle beasts long ago. I craft unique monstrosities! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I gave it choice warriors to feed on, but then it escaped and hid somewhere in the Mangled Sector... I could catch it, but a new idea has since captivated my mind!"

"Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"

"Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"

"Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"

"Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"

languages.text: « Tout à fait. Même les Cérastes les plus compétents et les Kabalites les plus puissants sont dépassés par les capacités destructrices de notre génie. Mais cela fait bien longtemps que j'ai cessé de me contenter de produire de simples bêtes de combats. Les monstruosités que je crée sont uniques ! Mon dernier spécimen, le Chtonos, surpasse de loin toutes les créatures jamais inventées par mes rivaux ! Je l'ai alimenté à l'aide de guerriers d'élite, mais il s'est échappé avant de se cacher dans le Secteur condamné... Je voulais le récupérer, mais j'ai été distrait par un autre projet ! »
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. Même les Cérastes les plus compétents et les Kabalites les plus puissants sont dépassés par les capacités destructrices de notre génie. Mais cela fait bien longtemps que j'ai cessé de me contenter de produire de simples bêtes de combats. Les monstruosités que je crée sont uniques ! Mon dernier spécimen, le Chtonos, surpasse de loin toutes les créatures jamais inventées par mes rivaux ! Je l'ai alimenté à l'aide de guerriers d'élite, mais il s'est échappé avant de se cacher dans le Secteur condamné... Je voulais le récupérer, mais j'ai été distrait par un autre projet ! »

languages.text: “这一点毫无疑问。即便是技艺最为精湛的巫灵与强大的阴谋团成员，也比不上我们的智慧带来的纯粹破坏力。不过，我早就超越了制造普通战兽的水平，我创造出来的怪物都是独一无二的！我最后一个实验对象叫‘奇托诺斯’，它超越了我所有的对手制造出的那些破烂玩意儿。我一直给它喂食精英战士，可它却逃了出去，躲在了崩落区……我本打算把它抓回来，但我脑中随后浮现出了有趣的新想法！”
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"

traits.locale_text: “这一点毫无疑问。即便是技艺最为精湛的巫灵与强大的阴谋团成员，也比不上我们的智慧带来的纯粹破坏力。不过，我早就超越了制造普通战兽的水平，我创造出来的怪物都是独一无二的！我最后一个实验对象叫‘奇托诺斯’，它超越了我所有的对手制造出的那些破烂玩意儿。我一直给它喂食精英战士，可它却逃了出去，躲在了崩落区……我本打算把它抓回来，但我脑中随后浮现出了有趣的新想法！”

languages.text: "Ganz ohne Zweifel. Selbst die fähigsten Hekatari und mächtigsten Kabalisten werden durch die pure Zerstörungskraft unseres Genies übertroffen. Und doch habe ich mich schon lange darüber hinausentwickelt, einfache Kampfbestien zu bauen. Die von mir erschaffenen Monstrositäten sind einzigartig! Mein letztes Versuchsstück, der Chtonos, hat jede jämmerliche Schöpfung meiner Rivalen übertroffen! Ich habe ihm Elitekrieger gefüttert, bis er entflohen ist und sich im Zerfleischten Sektor versteckt hat ... Ich hätte ihn ja eingefangen, doch dann hat eine neue Idee meine Aufmerksamkeit beansprucht!"
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"

traits.locale_text: "Ganz ohne Zweifel. Selbst die fähigsten Hekatari und mächtigsten Kabalisten werden durch die pure Zerstörungskraft unseres Genies übertroffen. Und doch habe ich mich schon lange darüber hinausentwickelt, einfache Kampfbestien zu bauen. Die von mir erschaffenen Monstrositäten sind einzigartig! Mein letztes Versuchsstück, der Chtonos, hat jede jämmerliche Schöpfung meiner Rivalen übertroffen! Ich habe ihm Elitekrieger gefüttert, bis er entflohen ist und sich im Zerfleischten Sektor versteckt hat ... Ich hätte ihn ja eingefangen, doch dann hat eine neue Idee meine Aufmerksamkeit beansprucht!"

languages.text: «Así es. La pura destructividad de nuestro intelecto supera hasta a las brujas más avezadas y a los poderosos Kabalistas. Pero yo ya hace mucho que dejé de construir bestias de batalla sencillas. ¡Las monstruosidades que creo son únicas! ¡Mi último espécimen, el Chtonos, ha superado a cualquier criatura insignificante creada por mis rivales! Lo alimenté a base de guerreros de élite hasta que escapó y se escondió en el Sector Destrozado... Habría ido a buscarlo en su momento, pero ¡me puse a trabajar en una nueva idea!».
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"

traits.locale_text: «Así es. La pura destructividad de nuestro intelecto supera hasta a las brujas más avezadas y a los poderosos Kabalistas. Pero yo ya hace mucho que dejé de construir bestias de batalla sencillas. ¡Las monstruosidades que creo son únicas! ¡Mi último espécimen, el Chtonos, ha superado a cualquier criatura insignificante creada por mis rivales! Lo alimenté a base de guerreros de élite hasta que escapó y se escondió en el Sector Destrozado... Habría ido a buscarlo en su momento, pero ¡me puse a trabajar en una nueva idea!».

languages.text: 「間違いない。最も熟練したウィッチや強大なカバライトでさえ、私たちの天才的な純粋な破壊力にはかなわない。だが私はとっくの昔に、ありふれた戦闘獣の形成を超えている。私が創り出す怪物は唯一無二だ！私の最後の標本であるチャトノスは、私のライバルが作ったあらゆる小物を凌駕した！エリート戦士たちに食べさせたが、逃げられ、切り裂かれた星域に逃げ込んでしまった…捕まえるつもりだったが、その時、新しいアイデアがひらめいたんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"

traits.locale_text: 「間違いない。最も熟練したウィッチや強大なカバライトでさえ、私たちの天才的な純粋な破壊力にはかなわない。だが私はとっくの昔に、ありふれた戦闘獣の形成を超えている。私が創り出す怪物は唯一無二だ！私の最後の標本であるチャトノスは、私のライバルが作ったあらゆる小物を凌駕した！エリート戦士たちに食べさせたが、逃げられ、切り裂かれた星域に逃げ込んでしまった…捕まえるつもりだったが、その時、新しいアイデアがひらめいたんだ！」

languages.text: "Hiç şüphesiz. En kabiliyetli Viçler ve en kudretli Kabalistler, dehamızın saf yok edici gücünün birer uzantılarıdır. Ancak ben sıradan muharebe yaratıkları yaratma seviyesini çok uzun süre önce aştım. Benim yarattığım yaratıklar eşsizdir! Son numunem Ktonos, rakiplerimin yaptığı her türlü çer çöpü geride bıraktı! Onu seçkin savaşçılarla besledim ancak bir gün kaçıp Biçimsiz Sektör'e saklandı. Onu yakalayabilirdim ama sonrasında ilgimi yeni bir fikir meşgul etti!"
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Even the most skilled Wyches and mighty Kabalites are outstripped by the pure destructiveness of our genius. Yet I long ago rose above the building of commonplace battle beasts. The monstrosities I create are unique! My last specimen, the Chtonos, surpassed every trifle ever made by my rivals! I fed it elite warriors until it escaped and hid in the Mangled Sector... I would have caught it, but then a new idea drew my attention!"

traits.locale_text: "Hiç şüphesiz. En kabiliyetli Viçler ve en kudretli Kabalistler, dehamızın saf yok edici gücünün birer uzantılarıdırlar. Ancak ben sıradan muharebe yaratıkları yaratma seviyesini çok uzun süre önce aştım. Benim yarattığım yaratıklar eşsizdirler! Son numunem Ktonos, rakiplerim tarafından yapılan her türlü çer çöpü geride bıraktı! Onu seçkin savaşçılarla besledim ancak bir gün kaçıp Biçimsiz Sektör'e saklandı. Onu yakalayabilirdim ama sonrasında ilgimi yeni bir fikir meşgul etti!"
